About Me

BIO

I am a self taught software engineer. I attended UIC for 2 years and then decided to drop out and attend a coding bootcamp called Fullstack Academy, where I learned web development. After completing this boot camp, I received an internship offer at Relativity, a legal tech company focused on E-discovery. During my time here I worked as a DevOps engineer. I worked on internal tooling, making improvements to Jenkins and Azure DevOps pipelines, writing scripts to automate tedious tasks, updating chef cookbooks/recipes used to configure VMs, as well as front end (Angular) and back end (C#) web development. I am experienced in JavaScript, Node.js, C#, Java, C++, SQL, Docker, React, React Native, AngularJS, .Net Framework (MVC), Jasmine, Mocha, JUnit, NUnit, Selenium, Github, Bitbucket, Jira, Chef, Jenkins, Azure DevOps, Powershell. Github: https://github.com/edgarc0998/

I am currently looking for an Entry level Software Engineering role. I am comfortable with full-stack development.
